The world module¶

class world.Scene(ID)[source]¶

Bases: object

A scene has an ID and involves a number of things.

class world.Thing(ID, attributes)[source]¶

Bases: object

A thing has an ID (a string variable), a kind (a string) and some information about which attributes it has, and in which scenes it occurs.

class world.World(probability_file, num_entities, num_scenes)[source]¶

Bases: object

The following are utility functions to generate a world.

check_incompatibilities(thing, attribute)[source]¶
sample_scene(ID, things)[source]¶
sample_thing(ID, kinds)[source]¶
scenes = None¶

Record probability data to generate the world
